Posts.Content: good luck Lola Lola you have been in my thoughts and prayers good luck today on first chemo. becky
Posts.Title: g

Posts.Content: I am in a different situation. My surgeon and Onc collaborate very well though. I had the surgery...lumpectomy for IDC and sentinel lobe before chemo. But the number one issue here is you have to be comfortable that you are getting the best treatment possible. I would press for them to communicate. In my prayers as always. becky
Posts.Title: Surgeon vs. Oncologist

Posts.Content: I love that play. What a great celebration.
Posts.Title: Surprise Plans for my upcoming cancerversary

Posts.Content: didn't know where that was going...thanks I always enjoy the laughs you provide for us Becky
Posts.Title: Final exam....

Posts.Content: I am sorry to hear you and your daughter are struggling with this, I will keep you in my prayers. I was a single mom for almost 17 years. I know it makes you feel sometimes like you have done something wrong. I am certain you are doing your very best and all will be well.
Posts.Title: prayers for my daughter

Posts.Content: I was in hospital and my eyes and vision were making me crazy. Gentle tears or something that is only saline....it helps! It won't burn. Just be sure it is not something with other additives. Natural Tears, Gentle tears etc. Hope it gets better soon becky
Posts.Title: Chemo Chicks

Posts.Content: It is for dry eyes...but it brings the ph balance back to normal. It will help clean out the eyes and they should feel better.
Posts.Title: Chemo Chicks

Posts.Content: It isn't off the subject at all. It is awesome that we are reminded from time to time that life is happening and being enjoyed in the midst of this battle. I hope you have an awesome trip. You have a great combination of relaxation, excitement and romance. Enjoy becky
Posts.Title: Our 35th anniversary

Posts.Content: I just wanted to add to Moopy's prayers and wishes for you. Be well I will be praying for you.
Posts.Title: Prayers and Good Thoughts for your Surgery Tomorrow, Judy
